Skip How to Unlock Press the blue lock icon to unlock Pull the lock open Pull the lockbar and shackle apart Push the lock closed Make sure the shackle is properly inserted. You\'ll feel a snap when the parts are properly seated. How to Lock Press the blue lock icon to lock. It\'s that easy. Lock and Stow When riding, keep the Lock in the locked position. Happy riding!
